it.polimi.ingsw.rmi

Class PlayerViewOnServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
        • it.polimi.ingsw.rmi.PlayerViewOnServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

    public class PlayerViewOnServer
extends View
    Player view on server class

    This class is an extension of the View class and is instantiated once for each player when he comes in game. This view is notified by the model of the current game in order to communicate to the player all relevant updates

    See Also:
